url: Add an api key '--bc-api-key <api-key>' to see more detailed insights via https://bridgecrew.cloud

passed_checks.check_name: Suspicious use of curl with secrets

steps.name: Run Checkov and generate reports
steps.run:
mkdir -p reports
# HTML report for GitHub Pages
checkov -d . -o html > reports/checkov-report.html || true
# JSON report for programmatic use
checkov -d . -o json > reports/checkov-report.json || true

steps.name: Deploy Checkov reports to GitHub Pages (/security)

code_block:
name: IaC Security Scan (Checkov)
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Install Checkov
        run: pipx install checkov

      # Adjust -d to your IaC directory (e.g., '.' or 'infra/')
      - name: Run Checkov and generate reports
        run: |
          mkdir -p reports
          # HTML report for GitHub Pages
          checkov -d . -o html > reports/checkov-report.html || true
          # JSON report for programmatic use
          checkov -d . -o json > reports/checkov-report.json || true

      # Attach reports to PRs for review
      - name: Upload Checkov report artifacts (PRs)
        if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: checkov-reports
          path: reports/

      # Publish reports to GitHub Pages (/security) on main
      - name: Deploy Checkov reports to GitHub Pages (/security)
        if: github.event_name == 'push' && github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          publish_dir: reports
          publish_branch: gh-pages
          destination_dir: security

  # ---------------------------------------
  # Build & Deploy Frontend
  # ---------------------------------------
  build-and-deploy-frontend:
    name: Build & Deploy Frontend

passed_checks.check_name: Suspicious use of curl with secrets

steps.name: Install and build frontend
steps.run:
cd frontend
npm install
npm run build
cp dist/index.html dist/404.html

code_block:
name: Build & Deploy Frontend
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [checkov-scan]   # waits for Checkov; remove if you prefer parallel jobs
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "18"

      - name: Install and build frontend
        run: |
          cd frontend
          npm install
          npm run build
          cp dist/index.html dist/404.html

steps.name: Deploy Checkov reports to GitHub Pages (/security)
Install and build frontend
steps.run:
cd frontend
npm install
npm run build
cp dist/index.html dist/404.html

code_block:
checkov-scan:
    name: IaC Security Scan (Checkov)
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Install Checkov
        run: pipx install checkov

      # Adjust -d to your IaC directory (e.g., '.' or 'infra/')
      - name: Run Checkov and generate reports
        run: |
          mkdir -p reports
          # HTML report for GitHub Pages
          checkov -d . -o html > reports/checkov-report.html || true
          # JSON report for programmatic use
          checkov -d . -o json > reports/checkov-report.json || true

      # Attach reports to PRs for review
      - name: Upload Checkov report artifacts (PRs)
        if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: checkov-reports
          path: reports/

      # Publish reports to GitHub Pages (/security) on main
      - name: Deploy Checkov reports to GitHub Pages (/security)
        if: github.event_name == 'push' && github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          publish_dir: reports
          publish_branch: gh-pages
          destination_dir: security

  # ---------------------------------------
  # Build & Deploy Frontend
  # ---------------------------------------
  build-and-deploy-frontend:
    name: Build & Deploy Frontend
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [checkov-scan]   # waits for Checkov; remove if you prefer parallel jobs
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "18"

      - name: Install and build frontend
        run: |
          cd frontend
          npm install
          npm run build
          cp dist/index.html dist/404.html

# JSON report for programmatic use

code_block:
- name: Run Checkov and generate reports
        run: |
          mkdir -p reports
          # HTML report for GitHub Pages
          checkov -d . -o html > reports/checkov-report.html || true
          # JSON report for programmatic use
          checkov -d . -o json > reports/checkov-report.json || true

      # Attach reports to PRs for review
      - name: Upload Checkov report artifacts (PRs)
        if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure run commands are not vulnerable to shell injection
code_block:
- name: Upload Checkov report artifacts (PRs)
        if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: checkov-reports
          path: reports/

      # Publish reports to GitHub Pages (/security) on main
      - name: Deploy Checkov reports to GitHub Pages (/security)
        if: github.event_name == 'push' && github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure run commands are not vulnerable to shell injection

results_configuration.name: Deploy Checkov reports to GitHub Pages (/security)

code_block:
- name: Deploy Checkov reports to GitHub Pages (/security)
        if: github.event_name == 'push' && github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          publish_dir: reports
          publish_branch: gh-pages
          destination_dir: security
